text:
Thanks. Yep - that was a typo here and not in my actual code.
It all sorted itself out after a few hours without any changes on my side! Weird one!
hi everybody! can anyone help me with problem. in the search my blod dont find any item <https://loads.cl/blog>

Does anyone have an ideal work around for sharing reports with non-HubSpot users via automated email? Seems like this is a big hurdle in functionality and super lame not achievable out of the box. So far my best work around is create a new HubSpot user with super limited permissions to just 1 company an external user can use to view restricted reports.

Hi <#C22PU4LV8|general> Is there a way to set a date property before another date property on a report? For example, I am trying to see number of sales activities happened after a record lead status becomes needs intro call.
Thomas yes please let's discuss bc I'm only one person
and this organization lacks any coherent anything with regard to technology let alone how to have usable workflows or anything
I was supposed to be able to set up my own team but then during the subsequent multiple useless zoom meetings with non technical executives for the N. American team
that they didn't want to pivot from Microsoft environment blahblah
but they already have HubSpot at some of the highest enterprise levels per month
using Epicor almost exclusively for Finance
need to build out workflows for marketing, sales and clinical
on HubSpot and also do data hygiene and migration
<@UBT0AHWLD> so how can this be accomplished?
I basically came in with the intention to do what you proposed and they shot it down
